descriptions.en_US: Control Google Meet from StreamController - toggle microphone, camera, raise hand, and send reactions from your Stream Deck. Features real-time state synchronization with Google Meet via a secure Chrome extension bridge. The Chrome extension is automatically downloaded during installation to dist/chrome_extension/ - simply load it as an unpacked extension in Chrome. Perfect for streamers, remote workers, and anyone who wants physical button control over their video meetings.

short-descriptions.en_US: Control Google Meet (mic, camera, hand, reactions) from your Stream Deck with real-time sync.
